name: Piedmont: Critters of Wood and Mountain
name_original: Piedmont: Critters of Wood and Mountain
description:
"Occasionally it happens that inexperienced hunters and others wandering in the woods disappear completely. Guides are unable to locate them, and all kinds of theories are offered to explain the disappearances."

-from Fearsome Creatures of the Lumberwoods by William T. Cox

Piedmont: Critters of Wood and Mountain is a weird Appalachian bestiary for Cairn and other Into the Odd derived games 

Based on Fearsome Critters folklore by William T. Cox and Henry H. Tryon, the Silver John tales of Manly Wade Wellman, and the wildlife of the Appalachian Mountains.

Critters of Wood and Mountain is the second part of Piedmont, an upcoming mystical Appalachian hack of Yochai Gal's Cairn. The first part can be found here: Piedmont: Songs of the Hills.

This bestiary was made for the Cairn: Forests of Another Name jam.
